# beget_configuration (Data Source)

Retrieve details of a single virtual server configuration (CPU, RAM, disk, bandwidth and pricing metadata) by its configuration ID.

## Fields
- `cpu`, `ram_mb`, `disk_mb`: hardware configuration
- `bandwidth_public`: bandwidth cap (Mbps)
- `price_day`, `price_month`: billing rates
- `available`, `custom`, `configurable`: availability flags
- `region`: server location
- `group`: CPU family

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Use configuration ID from data source inside an instance
locals {
  heavy_conf = data.beget_configuration.heavy_v4
}

data "beget_configuration" "heavy_v4" {
  id = "heavy_v4"
}

output "heavy_v4_summary" {
  value = "${local.heavy_conf.cpu} CPU / ${local.heavy_conf.ram_mb} MB RAM"
}
```
```terraform
# Inspect specific VPS configuration
data "beget_configuration" "heavy" {
  id = "heavy_v4"
}

output "heavy_v4_specs" {
  value = {
    cpu         = data.beget_configuration.heavy.cpu
    ram_mb      = data.beget_configuration.heavy.ram_mb
    disk_mb     = data.beget_configuration.heavy.disk_mb
    price_day   = data.beget_configuration.heavy.price_day
    price_month = data.beget_configuration.heavy.price_month
    region      = data.beget_configuration.heavy.region
    group       = data.beget_configuration.heavy.group
  }
}
```
